data.message:
Eminem it's for You man. Love you.    
The music is so loud
Are you hearing the sound ??
Somebody making the beats how ? 
I am hearing the voice every body says wow
Yo! This is silly Harry 
I feel a little hazy
I had a dream to be a rapper like Marshall 
And people guess that I am just a fool 
Hey guys now cool 
What you think I don't know 
What you do I don't know 
But remember when you talk about eminem
My heart's rapper wake up so why I join them 
Marshal I am your such a biggest fan 
I could never had dream that I rip stadium fine
Are you gaining the words
Understanding the words 
The feelings of heart's
I wanna rap like you 
And I will I wanna meet you
